text: Robert Harvey Coronado (born May 22, 1936) is a former American football player who played for Pittsburgh Steelers of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at the University of the Pacific. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Pacific Tigers football players Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:American football wide receivers Category:Players of American football from California Category:Sportspeople from Vallejo, California
title: Bob Coronado
